attributes.action: Make UK school time 1h for all schools
attributes.additional_details: Because school is boring and u can get everything on internet now!
attributes.background: Make all UK's schools including primarys middle first schools and highschools college universitys

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the hours educational institutions are open is a matter for individual educational institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.c

The Government could restrict the opening hours of state-maintained schools in England, so we could accept a petition calling for schools in England to be limited to open for a certain number of hours a week or day.
